title: Russian Think Tank Profiles BRICS Bank as IMF Counterpart to De-Dollarize Credit Markets
description: The Roscongress Foundation, a Russian think tank, has profiled the New Development Bank, known as the BRICS bank, as an alternative to the International Monetary Fund (IMF) in its latest “Decolonization in Energy Markets” report. Nation members could secure loans based on their energy-exporting capabilities, which would be liquid, and similar to the Special Drawing […]

title: Big Eyes Coin, Bone ShibaSwap, and Pepe Coin: The 3 Best Meme Coins of 2023
description: According to a recent CNBC report, Bitcoin had a surge in price following an update that Hong Kong will allow retail trading of cryptocurrency from the 1st of June.  Prices went from $26,800 to $27,384 within a brief period of around 2 hours.
